name: Video tutorial on how to convert PDF to PDF/A
description:
In this video, you will learn how to convert a PDF file to PDF/A in a few minutes
Convert Pdf To  PDF/A-1A, PDF/A-1B, PDF/A-2A,PDF/A-2B, PDF/A-3A, PDF/A-3B, PDF/A-2U, PDF/A-3U 
Change PDFs to PDF/A format for long-term storage & archiving .
